metadata.title: Charles-Hubert, Paris Men's 3958-N Premium Collection Analog Display Japanese Quartz Brown Watch
features: Multi-function features day, date, 24-hour indicator and dual time display
description: Since 1990, Charles-Hubert Pans has been a major influence in the United States watch industry. By including both retro and contemporary designs in its line, Charles-Hubert Paris has established a large and loyal following. With its unprecedented Lifetime Warranties, exceptional quality standards and affordable pricing, the future looks very bright for Charles-Hubert Paris.

This elegant designed Charles-Hubert Paris watch features stainless steel case, genuine leather band, dual time with day, date and 24-hour indicator. This watch comes with Japanese Quartz movement, lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects, 50 m (165 ft.) water-resistant and deluxe paper gift box.
